column1: What is the “all and only” requirement for constructing good definitions? Be able to provide examples
of a definition of something X that fails to meet the “all and only” requirement

column2: and what is the process of elenchus that characterizes early Socratic

column1: ● Socrates and Euthyphro consider the possibility that the holy is what all the gods love. Explain the two
ways that this definition might be interpreted.
● What is Divine Command Theory? How does the Euthyphro dilemma apply to this theory? Explain how
both horns of the Euthyphro dilemma lead to an unsatisfying result for DCT.
